stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.8.723
stable.description: This update adds Delete menu in Slideshow mode, fixes some issues, including SVG file zooming, images overlapping, HEIC orientation. ⚠️ WARNING: Vulnerability Report - Severity: High (7.5/10) - Name: Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30105 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability - Affected versions: ImageGlass 9 running on .NET 8.0.6 or below.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.8.723
kobe.description:
[WARNING] Vulnerability Report:
- Severity: High (7.5/10)
- Name: Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30105 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability
- Affected versions: v8.12.4.30 or below

ImageGlass 8 is end of life, no public updates or patches released to address this. You may opt for the Paid Support Service for a fee, or upgrade to ImageGlass 9 (free).
